website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use with a unique design, this fun golf ball washer can also be used to polish irons.
pros: Resists water on the outside while maintaining moisture on the inside
Internal part is antimicrobial for a thorough clean
cons: The inside dries out quickly and must be re-moistened
Some users say they have to do this more than once per hour

customer_reviews.title: Get one for your game
customer_reviews.text: This product is really genius. For covid times when ball washers are either not put out on the course or have no water in them, this does the trick. Pour in a little water and it is ready to go. Drop in a dirty ball and work it around. Out comes a like new, clean ball. Also works get for dirty irons. Would highly recommend to all serious golfers.
customer_reviews.author: brian c

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's functional in its current design. It retains moisture and clean balls and clubs. HOWEVER, the opening should have a elastic band instead of a solid non-elastic stitching. The non-elastic band/stitching makes it difficult to fit clubs and difficult to flip it inside-out for drying. It is a simple design change and I would love to purchase this again if it had an elastic opening.
customer_reviews.author: Dingo

customer_reviews.title: Better than a towl  and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very useful because I play on a course where the carts do not have a ball cleaner. Small enough to put in your pocket so you always have access to the cleaner when you need to clean up your ball.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Cool

customer_reviews.title: Works great, with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.text: All the ball washers have bee taken out due to the Covid overreaction. This thing works great. Seriously takes the grass stain off in seconds. This is a must have, I was amazed at how well this thing works. Best purchase I have made in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Gk

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says it is a bit pricey in my opinion. That being said it works great! As good as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JoMike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for any avid golfer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift for a friend. Comes in it's own cardboard box with instructions for easy gifting. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bohemian Gypsy Stix

customer_reviews.title: A clean club face will always result in a better shot
customer_reviews.text: The fact that with this I can quickly and easily clean both the golf balls and the faces of my irons right after my shot, makes this invaluable to having a good golf game. I turn it inside out and throw it in the wash after a couple of rounds, and it's good to go again. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Allen M. White

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best value for money. After I put water in and drain, it cleans my balls through 18 and still damp.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Best portable ball & iron cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting this BallBrite for months, and when the price came down I had to get one. This ball and iron cleaner completely outperformed other lower quality cleaners I previously had. The material is of higher quality, the cleaning is better, and the hook onto the bag is better, too.
customer_reviews.author: rreyna20

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Staple on my golf bag. A little water in there and ball cleaner for 18 holes
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am using it every time out. With much rain and muddy courses, this comes in mighty handy to clean balls and clubs on the fly. No slowing down of play. It is always there attached to my belt loop. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: PeterB

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have with no ball washers on the course!
customer_reviews.author: frank x. kunz

customer_reviews.title: Use a towel instead
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would work much better. I feel that it dries up quickly Better off just using a towel
customer_reviews.author: Margie Rothfeld

customer_reviews.title: Golf ball becomes discolored
customer_reviews.text: When golf ball is placed inside to clean, the cover of the ball becomes discolored....a blue-ish gray. Unacceptable for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cloppert

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, it is a better club cleaner than a ball cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good ball washer
customer_reviews.text: Decent ball washer that is available anytime you need to use it. I've used it numerous times and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo1615

customer_reviews.title: Best ball cleaner yet
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I have tried several others this is by far the best. Inside stays damp for entire round cleans ball well and the most amazing thing is it holds your ball doesn't fall out. First few times you use you may find yourself looking for your ball LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Thoen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! Cleans your dirty balls and irons as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Stays moist and cleans ball well.
customer_reviews.text: It stays moist all day in the hottest conditions. It is even moist the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Vimo

customer_reviews.title: MsGolf
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be and can't wait to use it when the MI golf season begins
customer_reviews.author: G. King

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better item than I expected. Does a great job at cleaning your ball and irons. Every golfer need one.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Price

customer_reviews.title: If you like grey balls.....
customer_reviews.text: This product turns the balls from white to grey. Thought it may just need laundering before use. Tried that. Same results. The balls actually come out dirtier when you clean them with this device.
customer_reviews.author: RON MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. When you first see it you pretty much think how can this product clean a golf ball. But put a little water in it at the beginning of a round and it cleans the ball pretty much spotless no matter how dirty it is. Really like it and it just hangs from your golf bag and takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

product_meta.title: BallBrite - The Ultimate Portable Golf Ball Cleaner
product_meta.description: BallBrite is the premier tool for golfers of all skill levels looking for a sanitary, effective, and convenient way to clean their golf balls on the green. Dubbed “The Green Caddy,” its patented design and unique shape allow you to always keep the BallBrite with you to ensure that your golf ball is always clean on the green so that your putts always roll true. This high functioning product is also extremely low maintenance. When your BallBrite gets dirty, just toss it into the washing machine and its good to go for your next round. All products sold from us (the manufacturer) are brand new shipped directly to you.
feature_bullets: The category leader in precision golf ball cleaning and polishing.
Ball Brite can also be used as an iron polishing tool.
Durability is a result of premium construction with the highest quality material.
A couple teaspoons of water into the BallBrite and the patented moisture locking technology allows the inside cleaning surface to stay wet while keeping the outer surface dry.
